alert.note: Alert for Billings; Dunn; Golden Valley; McLean; Mercer; Sheridan (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued October 25 at 7:00AM CDT until October 26 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT /MIDNIGHT MDT/ THURSDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to two inches and ice accumulations on elevated objects up to one tenth of an inch. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. There is a 70 to 80 percent chance of 6 or more inches of snow. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM CDT /midnight MDT/ Thursday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from late tonight through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Billings; Dunn; Golden Valley; McLean; Mercer; Sheridan
